summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Cakely Home Baker storefront website. All major functionality working correctly including navigation, form validation, WhatsApp integration, gallery lightbox, FAQ accordion, and mobile responsiveness.
passed_tests: Home page loads with all sections visible (Hero, Trust Bar, Menu, Gallery, FAQ, Order Form)
Hero section displays with Order on WhatsApp and View Menu CTAs
Menu section displays 6 cake cards with category filters working
Menu category filter buttons work (All, Theme Cakes, Normal Cakes, etc.)
Gallery section displays 6 images in responsive grid layout
Gallery lightbox opens, navigates, and closes properly when clicking images
FAQ accordion expands and collapses correctly on click (6 FAQ items)
Order form displays all required fields (Name, Item Type, Date, Delivery Mode)
Order form displays all optional fields (Mobile, Weight, Flavor, Occasion, Time, Area, Budget, Notes)
Order form validation shows 4 error messages for empty required fields
Order form WhatsApp integration works - opens WhatsApp with encoded message and correct phone number (918879878493)
Mobile responsive layout works correctly - all sections display properly on mobile viewport
Mobile form interactions work - input fields and dropdowns function on mobile
Footer displays with 4 quick links and contact information
All interactive elements (buttons, links) are clickable and functional
Menu order buttons scroll to order form section correctly
Sticky WhatsApp CTA appears after scrolling
